name: KeyFinder (JRIngram)
description:
KeyFinder

Search through an underwater fortress maze to find a key, then venture to the next level via a trapdoor. Travel through doors to go to different rooms and dodge darts whilst doing so!

Supported on Windows only. 

Controls

Use the arrow controls on the keyboard to navigate up, down, left and right.

Credits

Made using the Godot engine.

All assets besides the fonts were made by me.

Font used in the game is Pixel Perfect by ToxicTyran, available at Dafont.com.
